Title: Relates to licensure by endorsement of certain registered professional nurses and licensed practical nurses
Summary: Provides for the licensure by endorsement of certain registered professional nurses and licensed practical nurses who hold a valid license to practice professional or practical nursing in Puerto Rico and have actively practiced nursing in Puerto Rico for two of the preceding three years without having their license acted against by the licensing authority of any jurisdiction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to licensure by endorsement of certain registered professional nurses and licensed practical nurses
